page.title: 04HEALTH IN CLOPHILL
page.content: As we are not a large village we do not have a{Medical Surgery}in{Clophill The nearest practices are at{Ampthill, {Flitwick, Barton}and{Shefford.}The {Chemists}are also in these towns. Our nearest{Hospitals}are at{Bedford, {Luton and Dunstable,}and the{Lister}at {Stevenage. We have a{Clinic}for the Mothers with small children. This calls twice a month to{The Green.}Routine injections and childcare advice are given, and babies can be weighed regularly. We also have a{Mobile Clinic}for {Family Planning}which calls monthly. Apart from the{School Dentist,}who checks the children's teeth regularly, there are{Dental Practices}in all the surrounding towns.
